meanings.definition: A class of drugs used to treat gout and other inflammatory conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed sulfinpyrazones to reduce the swelling in my joints.
meanings.sent2: Many patients find relief from gout after taking sulfinpyrazones regularly.
meanings.sent3: After taking the sulfinpyrazones, I felt like my joints were throwing a party without pain invited.
meanings.sent4: The sulfinpyrazones acted like firefighters, calming down the inflammation in my body.
meanings.sent5: The image of sulfinpyrazones as tiny warriors fighting off the inflammation stuck in my mind.
